xxl.core.io.raw
Class StatisticsRawAccess

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.raw.StatisticsRawAccess
All Implemented Interfaces:
RawAccess
public class StatisticsRawAccess
extends Object
implements RawAccess

Counts the calls to a (decorated) raw access and calculates a statistic of seeks.

Two LogscaleHistograms are computed:

  1. seek distance histogram: average seek time for a certain seek distance
  2. seek time histogram: number of accesses that needed a certain amount of time
To get the statistics, call the toString() method.

                           double sdHistFactor,
                           double tHistFactor)
                    throws RawAccessException
Constructs a RawAccessStatistic.

Parameters:
r - Decorated RawAccess
partitions - Number of partition for both LogScaleHistograms
sdHistFactor - Partition growth factor for the seek distance histogram
tHistFactor - Partition growth factor for the seek time histogram
